title: Back To School - Original Soundtrack + Bonus Track
description:
Here is the soundtrack to 1986&#039;s "Back To School" starring Rodney Dangerfield. Okay, tracks 2 though 9 come from the LP, which I recorded to my computer (the quality seems decent to me with no hissing, popping, or skipping). Originally track 1 (the title track "Back To School," an excellent song by Jude Cole) skipped very badly. I dealt with that for years and then yesterday I found a fanvid on YouTube someone made with a quality version of the song so I snagged that to replace the skippy version. Track 10 is actually the main score by Danny Elfman, taken from his "Music From a Darkened Theatre" collection, which I included because I can. Also included is the soundtrack LP cover art. All music files are mp3s.

So, only the bonus track came from an actual CD, but I really think the quality is very good on the other tracks. Enjoy! As always, if you need this seeded, contact me at sparky(at)theneitherworld.com

Track Listing:

01 - Back To School, Jude Cole
02 - Educated Girl, Bobby Caldwell
03 - Learnin&#039; and Livin&#039;, Tyson & Schwartz
04 - Everybody&#039;s Crazy, Michael Bolton
05 - I&#039;ll Never Forget Your Face, Phillip Ingram
06 - Twist and Shout, Rodney Dangerfield
07 - Dead Man&#039;s Party, Oingo Boingo
08 - On My Way, Tyson & Schwartz
09 - Respect, Aretha Franklin
10 - Back To School (Instrumental), Danny Elfman
